messages.subject: Sec's streamload continuation
messages.msgSnippet: Sec has sent me all the files from her streamload account. I will be leaving it up hosted at the shinsengumi folder in http://www.streamload.com/green_2 use
messages.messageBody:
Sec has sent me all the files from her streamload account. I will be
leaving it up hosted at the shinsengumi folder in

http://www.streamload.com/green_2

use password: miburo

If I find anything useful I'll add on to her list, but for now I
suggest SHQ members should check out "Aizu in California". It's an
interesting read.

There is another folder that contains large video, manga and music
files which I'm sure most of us here already have. I'm limiting
access to that so if you need access please e-mail me.
